list.name: DocEE
list.content: A toolkit for document-level event extraction, containing some SOTA model implementations.

list.name: REx
list.content: A PyTorch-based scaffold toolkit for Relation Extraction and more.

list.name: Watchmen
list.content: A GPU scheduling toolkit for queuing jobs

list.name: random-luck
list.content: Automatically select the best random seed based on ~~ancient Chinese I Ching~~ (random luck). Good luck and best wishes!

list.name: paper-hero
list.content: A toolkit to help search for papers from aclanthology, arXiv and dblp.
